message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the uses of a stove and the cooking process. The stove is a cooking appliance that can be used to cook a variety of dishes. Option (A), ice cream sundaes, cannot be made directly on the stove as it requires a freezer to freeze the ice cream. Option (B), whipped cream, can be made using a mixer or by hand, not on the stove. Option (D), ice cream sandwiches, also requires pre-made ice cream and cannot be made on the stove. Option (C), egg noodles, can be cooked on the stove by boiling water and simmering the noodles until they are cooked.
